basics.name: Saurabh Maydeo
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: PhD student in Computer Science at UT Arlington, researching LLM Safety, Multi-Agent Systems, and AI Security. Former Software Engineer at Amazon.

work.name: University of Texas at Arlington
work.summary: Conducting research on LLM Safety, Multi-Agent Systems, and AI Security.
highlights: Research focus on LLM security and safety

work.name: Amazon
work.summary: Developed backend solutions for ad delivery systems, enhancing publishers' inventory monetization.
highlights: Developed Java backend solutions for ad delivery system
Designed business logic and DAO layer for persistent data storage
Deployed Event Producer library simplifying event publication
Resolved production issues through meticulous troubleshooting

work.name: Truist
work.summary: Applied machine learning to extract insights from financial data models.
highlights: Leveraged ML algorithms on Retail Deposit Attrition Model
Developed hackathon project analyzing call center data

work.name: Georgia State University
work.summary: Worked on spatio-temporal trajectory analysis in the solar astroinformatics domain at DMLab.
highlights: Spatio-temporal trajectory datasets from solar astroinformatics
Published research on local outlier detection

work.name: Georgia State University
work.summary: Supported Advanced Machine Learning course under Dr. Sergey Plis.
highlights: Evaluated assignments and conducted doubt-solving sessions

projects.name: Breast Cancer Classification
projects.summary: Developed an ML model to classify patients into malignant and benign for breast cancer with 96.50% accuracy using Random Forest.

projects.name: Disaster Tweet Classification
projects.summary: Built an ML model to classify tweets into disastrous and non-disastrous categories, achieving 80.90% F1 score using BERT.

projects.name: Cloud-Based File Storage System
projects.summary: Created a cloud-based file storage system inspired by Google Drive using AWS S3 and RDS.
